post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
few books I had read last couple months.
- 김대중, 다시 새로운 시작을 위하여 by DJ After reading you see DJ from different perspective. How much of love he has toward life and country.
- Six Thinking Hats by Edward de Bone whos is the also author of Lateral Thinking It can provide powerful thinking process for from daily to life long.
- Telling Each Other the Truth by William Beckus I always thought I was very honest to myself and I tried to get to the point. But after above book I had learned I have to start from the scratch
- Attitude is everything by Keith ??? Former NCAA backetball player who did not make NBA. But he is now well known guest speaker. He is very straight forward to point. His major was game not psychology
post.title: Book Talk
